reviews.review_msg: Dr.Reading is caring. However, this class was VERY disorganized. Assignments were unclear. Criteria would be posted very close to deadlines. No coordination with him and the TA, and when asked about assignments they would give different answers.lectures were disorganized. This added unnecessary stress for students. I would avoid taking this class.

If you get a chance to take a class with him do it! Pretty interesting stuff which makes studying for his exams easy leading to an "easy" exam if you understand the concepts. Only downside is there's not that many readings but the readings that given are LOOONG, but no memory required just understand concepts and be able to apply!
